title: Where Do We Go From Here?
content: Armed with a sense of various structural, philosophical, and cultural forces embedded in current trends of planetary degradation, envisioning a path forward becomes more imaginative and multi-faceted. What does it look like to manipulate economic structures? Social norms and values? Legal frameworks? Where do traditional approaches to sustainability get us, and where do we have to think more broadly? Students explore a variety of approaches to moving through todayâ€™s environmental challenges, drawing upon multiple disciplinary lenses, engaging creativity through science fiction, and identifying solutions that shift our conceptions of who we are in relation to our surroundings.
